alert.note: Alert for Garden; Sheridan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 16 at 4:22PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Garden and southwestern Sheridan Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 321 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Wild Horse Butte to near Alliance Airport to 16 miles west of Crescent Lake National Wildlife Refuge. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ellsworth, Antioch, Patterson Lake, Britton Lake, Kennedy Lake, Wild Horse Flats, Snow Lake, Miles Lake, Mumper, Wickson Lake, Diamond Lake, Lakeside, Herman Lake, Jerry Lake, Krause Lake and Tralnor Lake. This includes the following highways... Highway 250 between mile markers 1 and 23. Highway 2 between mile markers 96 and 123. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
